segments.text: Mmm . Nice and crunchy . And they leave a space uncovered for you to hold ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're so much fun to eat . You can suck all the coating off first ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Or just stuff the whole thing in your mouth at once !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But that way you're not savoring it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! The movie hasn't even started and they're almost gone !
segments.speaker: S2
